description: Benjamin Griveaux condemns a "torrent of mud" after a video is apparently posted by a Russian artist.
title: Griveaux Paris race: Sex video prompts Macron ally to step down
title_page: Griveaux Paris race: Sex video prompts Macron ally to step down - BBC News
maintext: He told French news channel LCI that Mr Griveaux was only the first politician that he would target: he had only just begun, he claimed. Politicians had to be honest and he said he would carry on fighting the "propaganda and puritanism of politicians".
